AddPetPage.title: Add New Pet
AddPetPage.subtitle: Create a digital profile for your pet to keep them safe and connected.
AddPetPage.cardDescription: We'll help you create a complete profile for your pet in just a few steps.
AddPetPage.feature1Description: Create a comprehensive profile with photos, medical info, and contact details.
AddPetPage.feature2Description: Link your pet's profile to an NFC chip for instant identification.
AddPetPage.feature3Description: Ensure your pet can be quickly returned if they get lost.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.heroDescription: Have questions about FacePet? We're here to help! Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactPage.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your question or concern...
form.successMessage: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: FacePet uses NFC technology to store your pet's information on a chip that can be scanned by any smartphone.
faq.answer2: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and privacy controls to protect your pet's information.
faq.question3: What if my pet gets lost?
faq.answer3: Anyone who finds your pet can scan the NFC chip to access your contact information and help reunite you.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.heroDescription: Your privacy and your pet's safety are our top priorities.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.heroDescription: Please read these terms carefully before using FacePet services.

CookieConsent.title: We use cookies to enhance your experience
CookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies. You can also choose to reject non-essential cookies.
CookieConsent.privacyNote: You can change your cookie preferences at any time in your account settings.

Footer.madeWithLove: Made with love for pet owners

ProductHighlights.headline: Never Lose Your Pet Again
ProductHighlights.subheading: Our state-of-the-art NFC chip helps ensure that your pet is quickly found if lost. Trusted by thousands of pet owners worldwide.

ConfirmProfileChanges.description: Are you sure you want to update your profile with these changes?
